page.title: 14WHY HOOK NEEDS A YOUTH CLUB
page.content: There has been a lot of talk lately about teenagers who meet in the centre of the village.The truth is there's nowhere else for us to go and be with our friends in Hook.We know we make a lot of noise,sometimes block the path and- 'make the the place look untidy'. Recently we've got the blame for some broken seats,vandalism at Elizabeth Hall and even for litter near the station.Sometimes car loads come from Fleet and bikers from all over just to make aggro-perhaps they do the damage. Since our photos were in the local paper lots of blokes have come to talk to us.One man said he would help us collect money to build a wooden club house if a plot could be found but we don't think there's much chance.Hook's getting bigger every day so there will be lots more teenagers,Bob and I hope something will be done soon.
